div.p:
Antonio:
So together, my biology and my choices determine whether or not I will develop heart disease.

Dr. Colliver:
Exactly, it’s a simple formula: Biology + Choices = Outcome. And the outcome is either an increased or decreased risk for heart disease or other health problems. That’s the basic equation for all lifestyle-related health problems.

Antonio:
Okay, so now that we’ve got the formula: Biology + Choices = Outcome, let’s take a closer look at the role each piece plays.
